    • Constructor Detail

      • OmicronLaserDevice

        public OmicronLaserDevice(int pDeviceIndex)
        Instanciates anOmicron laser device from a device id. The laser details are obytained from the current machine configuration file.
        Parameters:
        pDeviceIndex - device index

      • OmicronLaserDevice

        public OmicronLaserDevice(int pDeviceIndex,
                          boolean pDigitalControl,
                          boolean pAnalogControl)
        Instanciates an Omicron laser device given a device index, and two flags about whether this laser is controlled via analog or digital controls.
        Parameters:
        pDeviceIndex - device index
        pDigitalControl - digital control flag
        pAnalogControl - analog control flag

      • OmicronLaserDevice

        public OmicronLaserDevice(java.lang.String pPortName)
        Instanciates an Omicron laser connect to the given serial communication port
        Parameters:
        pPortName - port name
